## ğŸ› Reporting Issues

If you've found a bug or have a feature request:

1. **Search existing issues**: Check if someone else has already reported it
   - [Bug reports](https://github.com/avilaops/AvilaOps/issues?q=is%3Aissue+label%3Abug)
   - [Feature requests](https://github.com/avilaops/AvilaOps/issues?q=is%3Aissue+label%3Aenhancement)

2. **Create a new issue**: Use our templates
   - [Report a bug](https://github.com/avilaops/AvilaOps/issues/new?template=bug_report.yml)
   - [Request a feature](https://github.com/avilaops/AvilaOps/issues/new?template=feature_request.yml)

## ğŸ”’ Security Issues

**Do not report security vulnerabilities through public GitHub issues.**

Please refer to our [Security Policy](SECURITY.md) for instructions on how to report security vulnerabilities responsibly.

## â° Response Times

We aim to respond to:

- **Security issues**: Within 24 hours
- **Bug reports**: Within 2-3 business days
- **Feature requests**: Within 1 week
- **General questions**: Within 3-5 business days

Please note that these are volunteer-maintained projects, and response times may vary.
